title: Drummer Boy on Pomona Upbringing, Growing Out of Gangbanging, Thuggin on GTA & More
description:
Drummer Boy on going from producer to rapper, Pomona, his ew artist, GTA and more!

----
00:00 Intro
0:00 - Drummer Boy finally got his driver’s license back
0:56 - Getting more responsible when you get more money
2:53 - Spending 10s of thousands of dollars in the club
4:44 - Getting into rap after homie got a life sentence
5:45 - Not banggin' on songs anymore
6:53 - Creating the Chicano-trap style. Transitioning out of gangster rap into more individuality-focused trap
8:13 - Keeping the name Drummer Boy after switching from producer to rapper
13:33 - Being independent, booking his own shows, doing a distribution deal with Empire
14:50 - Buying a new house. Having a 540 credit score and trying to buy a house with cash
16:49 - Getting into GTA role-playing during the pandemic
22:15 - Making a promise to his son that he would buy a house this year
26:58 - Being small and having little man syndrome in his younger years
37:20 - DoKnow and Drummer Boy compare their favorite movies
39:10 - Drummer Boy on possibility of getting into acting
40:40 - Upcoming show with Suga Free
45:05 - Wrapping up. Follow @Drummer909. Tap in with Drummer Boy’s new artist Charlie Stone

---
